cards.question: What tones are in a triad
Where is the Route53 name derived from
cards.answer: Route66 was first USA route and 53 is DNS port for publicly exposing to internet

cards.question: What is Amazon's data warehousing service
How many AWS regions are there (2017)
What is the root AWS account
cards.answer: The AWS email used to sign up for AWS

cards.question: What are some steps afte setting up an account
cards.answer: Change link for users to sign on.  Multifactor auth.  Create users.  Associate to groups.

cards.question: What default permissions do new AWS users have after created
cards.answer: None, they must be added to groups or have policies attached manually

cards.question: What is an IAM group and why is it useful
cards.answer: Groups are definable sets of policies.  Users assigned to a group get all policies assigned to that group.  It is much easier to add a user to a group than to add many policies individually to each user.

cards.question: What is an IAM policy
cards.answer: Define actions, services, and more that a user has access to within AWS
